p.span:
Please complete the form on the link below by 10:00am each day to satisfy the attendance requirement.
Do all your assignments for the day to earn credit which will reflect in your grades.

a.title: Use this link to enter Daily Attendance

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

p.span: I hope this message finds you and your family safe and healthy! In order to try to make Virtual Learning and Distance learning better, we are asking that you take a short, anonymous survey. The purpose of the survey is to get your opinion on how we can better serve our students through this pandemic. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. I have attached the link to this email and will also post it on the School Facebook Page. Please do the survey by Friday, May 1st. Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

br.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 19, 215); font-family: "Comic Sans MS";

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

br.span: For all students who take home their computers the recommended method of cleaning the surfaces and screen are as follows.

br.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 19, 215); font-family: "Comic Sans MS";

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

br.span: Lysol wipes are the preferred choice for the keyboard and screen. They may leave a "haze" on the screens so you can buff the haze off with a clean microfiber cloth if necessary. If the Lysol wipe is extremely wet, wring it out slightly before using. Other wipes can be used, however DO NOT use any cleaners that contain bleach and DO NOT spray any cleaners directly on the keyboard or screen.
